mean_cn: n. 恐慌，怯懦，早期爵士乐
mean_en: a condition in which you are unable to think or behave normally because you are sad, depressed, etc.
short_phrase: The sad man is in a funk.
sentence: Funk combines elements of jazz, blues and soul; people just love dancing to it.
sentence_trans: 疯克音乐包含了爵士、蓝调、灵魂乐的元素，大家很喜欢跟着它跳舞。
